issue.title: [C++] Divide up arrow/array.h,cc into files in arrow/array/ similar to builder files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6052](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6052). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since these files are getting larger, this would improve codebase navigability. Probably should use the same naming scheme as builder_\* e.g. `arrow/array/array_dict.h`

I recommend also putting the unit test files related to these in there for better semantic organization.
